Description.Details: LTV-4's main gun is its Particle Projector Cannon mounted in the turret. A single 4-tube Short Range Missile launcher is added to the turret as secondary weapon. Powered by a 115 rated Internal Combustion Engine, the craft can achieve respectable speed of 110 kph. Crowning achievement of design its prototype Standard-Grade Armor, 5.5 tons material encases the vehicle's hull.
